active_skill.desc_ja: スキル使うと、次の階段に変化。最終階段のスキル使うと、最初のスキル戻る：１、全ドロップのロック状態を解除。全ドロップを火、水、木、光、闇、回復ドロップに変化。1ターンの間、自分の攻撃力を5倍；２、HPが1になる。全ドロップのロック状態を解除。全ドロップを火、水、木、光、闇、回復ドロップに変化
active_skill.desc_en: After each skill, evolve to the next: 1) Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to Fire, Water, Wood, Light, Dark, and Heal orbs; For 1 turn, 5x ATK for this monster 2) Reduce HP to 1; Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to Fire, Water, Wood, Light, Dark, and Heal orbs
active_skill.desc_ko: After each skill, evolve to the next: 1) Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to 불、물、나무、빛、어둠、회복 orbs; For 1 turn, 5x 공격력 for this monster 2) Reduce HP to 1; Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to 불、물、나무、빛、어둠、회복 orbs
active_skill.desc_templated_ja: スキル使うと、次の階段に変化。最終階段のスキル使うと、最初のスキル戻る：１、全ドロップのロック状態を解除。全ドロップを火、水、木、光、闇、回復ドロップに変化。1ターンの間、自分の攻撃力を5倍；２、HPが1になる。全ドロップのロック状態を解除。全ドロップを火、水、木、光、闇、回復ドロップに変化
active_skill.desc_templated_en: After each skill, evolve to the next: 1) Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to Fire, Water, Wood, Light, Dark, and Heal orbs; For 1 turn, 5x ATK for this monster 2) Reduce HP to 1; Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to Fire, Water, Wood, Light, Dark, and Heal orbs
active_skill.desc_templated_ko: After each skill, evolve to the next: 1) Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to 불、물、나무、빛、어둠、회복 orbs; For 1 turn, 5x 공격력 for this monster 2) Reduce HP to 1; Unlock all orbs; Change all orbs to 불、물、나무、빛、어둠、회복 orbs
active_skill.desc_official_ja: 全ドロップのロックを解除し、5属性＋回復に変化。 1ターンの間、自分の攻撃力が5倍。スキルが進化。
active_skill.desc_official_en: Removes Orb locks, changes Orbs to all Att. & Heal; 5x this ally's ATK for 1 turn, this skill evolves
active_skill.desc_official_ko: 모든 드롭의 잠금을 해제하고 5속성+회복으로 변화 1턴 동안 자신의 공격력이 5배. 스킬이 진화

active_subskills.desc_ja: 全ドロップのロック状態を解除。全ドロップを火、水、木、光、闇、回復ドロップに変化。1ターンの間、自分の攻撃力を5倍

all_series.name_ja: パズドラレーダー連動

awoken_skill.name: Resistance-Bind+
awoken_skill.desc_ja: 自分自身へのバインド攻撃を無効化する
awoken_skill.desc_en: Blocks Bind attacks directed at itself
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 자신이 바인드 공격을 받았을 시 바인드 공격을 무효화한다

awoken_skill.name: Skill Boost+
awoken_skill.desc_ja: チーム全体のスキルが2ターン溜まった状態で始まる
awoken_skill.desc_en: Team starts with 2 less turns needed to activate skills
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 팀 전체의 스킬이 2턴 쌓인 상태에서 시작

awoken_skill.name: Resistance-Skill Bind
awoken_skill.desc_ja: スキル封印を無効化することがある (20%確率)
awoken_skill.desc_en: 20% chance to block Skill Bind attacks (additive across team)
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 스킬 봉인 공격을 받았을 시 스킬 봉인 공격을 무효화한다 (개당 20% 확률)

awoken_skill.name: Extended Move Time+
awoken_skill.desc_ja: ドロップ操作時間1秒が延びる
awoken_skill.desc_en: Extends time to move Orbs by 1 second

awoken_skill.name: Extended Move Time+
awoken_skill.desc_ja: ドロップ操作時間1秒が延びる
awoken_skill.desc_en: Extends time to move Orbs by 1 second

awoken_skill.name: Guard Break
awoken_skill.desc_ja: 5属性同時攻撃すると敵の防御力を無視してダメージを与える
awoken_skill.desc_en: This monster inflicts DEF-ignoring damage when attacking with 5 Att.
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 5속성 동시공격 시 적의 방어력을 무시하고 대미지를 준다

awoken_skill.name: 5-Color ATK Enhance
awoken_skill.desc_en: 4.5x ATK for this monster when matching 5+ colors at once

awoken_skill.name: 5-Color ATK Enhance
awoken_skill.desc_en: 4.5x ATK for this monster when matching 5+ colors at once

awoken_skill.name: 5-Color ATK Enhance
awoken_skill.desc_en: 4.5x ATK for this monster when matching 5+ colors at once

awoken_skill.name: God Killer
awoken_skill.desc_ja: 神タイプの敵に対して攻撃力が3倍
awoken_skill.desc_en: Increase ATK against God enemies by 3x & increase damage cap by 1.2x against God enemies
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 신 타입의 적을 상대로 공격력이 상승 (3배)

awoken_skill.name: Damage Void Piercer
awoken_skill.desc_ja: 自分と同じ属性のドロップを3×3の正方形で消すと攻撃力が2.5倍にし、ダメージ無効を貫通する
awoken_skill.desc_en: Matching a 3x3 Orb square of the same Att. as this monster boosts this match's ATK by 2.5x and ignores damage-voiding status
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 자신과 같은 속성의 드롭을 3x3 정사각형 모양으로 맞추면 해당 몬스터의 공격력이 2.5배 상승, 대미지 무효를 무시한다

awoken_skill.name: Skill Boost+
awoken_skill.desc_ja: チーム全体のスキルが2ターン溜まった状態で始まる
awoken_skill.desc_en: Team starts with 2 less turns needed to activate skills
awoken_skill.desc_ko: 팀 전체의 스킬이 2턴 쌓인 상태에서 시작

leader_skill.desc_en: 17x ATK and reduce damage taken by 50% when matching 6 or more colors (5+heal); 1 additional true damage when matching 6 or more colors (5+heal); 1.8x all stats for Dragon type
leader_skill.desc_ja: 6色(5色+回復)以上同時攻撃で攻撃力が17倍、受けるダメージを50％減少。6色(5色+回復)以上同時攻撃、固定1ダメージ。ドラゴンタイプの全パラメータが1.8倍。
leader_skill.desc_ko: 5속성+회복의 동시 공격 시 대미지를 반감 공격력이 17배, 고정 1 대미지. 드래곤타입의 모든 파라미터가 1.8배

name_en: Mega Awoken Dusk Shadow God, Ra Dragon
name_ja: 極醒の冥黒神・ラー＝ドラゴン
